\par\vspace{0.5em}

\subsection{Q3 Review}

Sarah presented the Q3 results:

\begin{itemize}
  \item User acquisition up 23\% vs. target of 20\%
  \item Feature adoption for new dashboard at 67\%
  \item Customer satisfaction score: 4.2/5.0
\end{itemize}

Key learnings from the quarter:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Mobile users engaging 2x more than desktop
  \item Onboarding flow improvements reduced drop-off by 15\%
  \item Support ticket volume down 30\% after help center launch
\end{itemize}

\{ block( width: 100\%, fill: rgb(""), stroke: 0.5pt + rgb(""), inset: 10pt, radius: 3pt, )[ {\small \textbf{üìù NOTE: }}

The mobile engagement data suggests we should prioritize mobile-first features in Q4.

] v(0.5em) \}

\subsection{Q4 Priorities}

The team discussed three major initiatives:

\textbf{1. Mobile App v2.0}

\begin{itemize}
  \item Complete redesign based on user research
  \item Offline mode support
  \item Push notification improvements
  \item Target: December 15 launch
\end{itemize}

\textbf{2. API Platform}

\begin{itemize}
  \item Public API for third-party integrations
  \item Developer documentation and sandbox
  \item Partner onboarding program
  \item Target: January 31 beta
\end{itemize}

\textbf{3. Enterprise Features}

\begin{itemize}
  \item SSO integration (SAML, OIDC)
  \item Advanced admin controls
  \item Audit logging
  \item Target: February 15
\end{itemize}

\{ block( width: 100\%, fill: rgb(""), stroke: 0.5pt + rgb(""), inset: 10pt, radius: 3pt, )[ {\small \textbf{‚úì DECISION: }}

Mobile App v2.0 is the priority for Q4. API Platform will run in parallel with a smaller team. Enterprise features will begin planning now for Q1 execution.

] v(0.5em) \}

\subsection{Resource Discussion}

Current team capacity:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Engineering: 8 developers (2 on maintenance)
  \item Design: 2 designers
  \item QA: 2 testers
\end{itemize}

Alex raised concern about timeline for mobile launch given holiday schedules. Team agreed to:

\begin{itemize}
  \item Front-load critical work before Dec 20
  \item Skeleton crew Dec 23-Jan 2
  \item Buffer week built into January
\end{itemize}

\{ block( width: 100\%, fill: rgb(""), stroke: 0.5pt + rgb(""), inset: 10pt, radius: 3pt, )[ {\small \textbf{‚úì DECISION: }}

Hire one contract developer for Nov-Dec to support mobile push. Jordan to coordinate with recruiting.

] v(0.5em) \}

] \}

\par\vspace{0.3em}
